message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it presents significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While $12,000 is my ideal price, I could meet you halfway at $11,000. This offer reflects the true worth of what I'm providing.  Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
